Item.Name: UIName
Item.Value: Wrap Scale : Controls how strong sun light hits particle ( 0 - no direct light , 1 - all direct light)

Item.Name: UIName
Item.Value: Wrap Scale : Controls how strong sun light hits particle ( 0 - no direct light , 1 - all direct light)

Item.Name: UIName
Item.Value: Wrap Bias : Controls how sun light spreads over surface ( 0 - no extra spread, 1- spreads all over surface)

Item.Name: UIName
Item.Value: Diffuse : Controls the amount of lighting on surface, color also controls this ( 0 - no light, 1- light)

Item.Name: UIName
Item.Value: ExtraLights : Controls the amount of lighting applied from the additional 4 lights in gta ( 0 - no light, 4- light)

Item.Name: UIName
Item.Value: Ambient Scale : Controls how much double ambient lighting to alpy to surface

Item.Name: UIName
Item.Value: Super Alpha : Boosts the alpha amount by the given value ( 1 - normal alpha, 2 - super alpha)

Item.Name: UIName
Item.Value: Normal Arc : Determines how much to bend normals outwards for vertex lighting ( 0 - bend completely outwards, 4 bend nearly ompletely inwards)

Item.Name: UIName
Item.Value: Near Scale : Amount to scale down particles as the camera gets near 1.0 means same as alpha fades down, 2.0 means twice as slow as alpha fades

Item.Name: UIName
Item.Value: Percentage of shadows to apply to directional light

Item.Name: UIName
Item.Value: Percentage of shadows to apply to ambient term

Item.Name: UIName
Item.Value: Clamp the max value a dotproduct can be
